lead_source.description: How the lead found us (website, referral, ad, etc)

current_solution.description: What solution the prospect is currently using

llm_config.begin_message: Hey there! This is calling from [Company]. How's it going?

tools.name: end_call
tools.description: End the call after booking a demo or if the prospect is not interested.

tools.name: book_demo
tools.description: Book a demo meeting for the prospect. Use this when they express interest in learning more.
tools.execution_message: Let me check our calendar for available times...

preferred_date.description: Preferred date for the demo (YYYY-MM-DD format)

preferred_time.description: Preferred time for the demo (HH:MM format)

tools.name: check_pricing
tools.description: Get custom pricing information based on the prospect's company size and needs.
tools.execution_message: Let me pull up our pricing options for you...

post_call_analysis_data.name: qualification_score
post_call_analysis_data.description: Lead qualification score from 1-10 based on fit and interest

post_call_analysis_data.name: next_step
post_call_analysis_data.description: Next action to take (demo_booked, follow_up, not_interested, callback_later)

post_call_analysis_data.name: pain_points
post_call_analysis_data.description: Main pain points or challenges mentioned by the prospect

post_call_analysis_data.name: budget_discussed
post_call_analysis_data.description: Was budget or pricing discussed during the call?
